city.name: Portugual
city.description: Dazzling coastlines, vibrant cities and rich history complete with charming villages and medieval coastlines; Portugal has all of this and more

favouriteSubjects.name: Full stack web Dev
favouriteSubjects.description: Full-stack developers have a high level of competency in both frontend and backend languages. They are skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, NodeJS, ExpressJS, Django, and PHP. Equally, full-stack developers understand various database management systems (DBMS) like MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and more

favouriteSubjects.name: 4IR Technologies
favouriteSubjects.description: The Fourth Industrial Revolution is a way of describing the blurring of boundaries between the physical, digital, and biological worlds. It's a fusion of advances in artificial intelligence (AI), robotics, the Internet of Things (IoT), 3D printing, genetic engineering, quantum computing, and other technologies

favouriteSubjects.name: Agile  Skill
favouriteSubjects.description: The agile web design process directs designers to release designs and get real-time feedback from users and other stakeholders early, providing an opportunity to make changes quickly and iteratively

places.name: Botanical Garden Walter Sisulu
places.description: Walter Sisulu Botanical Garden is a home to more than 600 plant species, has the most beautiful waterfall for pictures and was renamed after Walter Sisulu.

places.name: Orlando Towers
places.description: Orlando Towers is located in one of the largest townships in South Africa, the most popular tourist attraction and is used for bungee jumping.

places.name: Waterfront Cape Town
places.description: The Joburg Art Gallery is the largest gallery in Africa. The building was designed by a British architect, Sir Edwin Lutyens, and the gallery houses works by artists such as Pablo Picasso.
